starters.name: Suya Skewers
starters.description: Spicy grilled beef skewers with ground peanut spice mix (Nigeria).

starters.name: Sambusa
starters.description: Crispy pastry filled with spiced lentils or minced beef (Ethiopia/Somalia).

main_courses.name: Jollof Rice with Chicken
main_courses.description: Smoky tomato-based rice served with grilled chicken (West Africa).

main_courses.name: Egusi Soup with Pounded Yam
main_courses.description: Ground melon seed soup with spinach and assorted meats, served with pounded yam (Nigeria).

main_courses.name: Injera with Doro Wat
main_courses.description: Spongy sour flatbread served with spicy chicken stew (Ethiopia).

main_courses.name: Bunny Chow
main_courses.description: Hollowed-out bread loaf filled with spicy curry (South Africa).

sides.name: Plantain Chips
sides.description: Crispy fried plantains sprinkled with sea salt (West Africa).

sides.name: Chapati
sides.description: Soft flatbread served as a side (East Africa).

drinks.name: Hibiscus Tea (Zobo/Bissap)
drinks.description: Refreshing sweet hibiscus flower drink (West Africa).

drinks.name: Palm Wine
drinks.description: Traditional naturally fermented palm sap drink.

desserts.name: Mandazi
desserts.description: Fried East African doughnut with a hint of coconut.

desserts.name: Malva Pudding
desserts.description: South African sponge pudding served with warm custard.
